reviews.sentence: Tucked away gem. We are not too keen on the large hotels and wanted something quaint. We found this small resort that perfectly suited our needs. The motel offers a variety of rooms from efficiency units to those with separate bedrooms. Ours had a microwave and generous refrigerator. There is a small beach pool and lovely tiki bar for watching sunsets. We ate our breakfast at the tiki bar as well and watched the ocean. People are very friendly. Many of the renters had been returning for years for a month at a time. We only stayed one night. I would highly recommend this motel. The only downside was that the pool was not heated when we stayed there.

NEVER go back. The place is old with no money spent on fixing up. Next to highway so noise all night. Pool is not heated and dirty. Washer did not work half the time. Not really on a beach where you could go in the water. Pictures on Internet are decieving. Lock the ice machine at night because someone might use too much. Everything is old and in need of repair. Not enough parking when they are full. The only thing we liked is they had plenty of hot water towels and the Internet worked well. Would NEVER go back.
ove the pool on the oceanthe shower.
Where is the lights. The hut was a resting placethe hut was in the middle of a car park. The dirty swimming pool was raised up and blocked any view of water.

The hotel was clean and beds were comfy. Plenty of pillows provided. The only negatives were that the pool was not heated and the bathtub faucet dripped continuously. A microwave would have been nice too. Very nice friendly staff.
Over valued. Bed were good. Ocean swimming not available.
Dump. Very rundown poorly maintained dirty pool scary looking appliances no phones in room tiny TV grounds ugly and poorly maintained.

Photos are very misleading. Garbage EVERYWHERE. Yuck. Not worth the price at all. The girl at the desk seemed nice enough earned the second star for them but still not making up for the 200 to view garbage floating they are too lazy to pick up. Yikes. No thanks. One night only will not return. Pool is very small and not maintained daily for sure. I had pay extra to be somewhere with a nicer experience.

extremely dirty. Everything was run down starting from the pool that was very dirty to the room and bathroom with broken furniture broken shower fixture cigarettes butts in front of the door. Only the location Cleanliness.

Nice place to stay for the money. Beautiful views great location and friendly staff. Property needs alot of maintenance done. Wood on dock is rotted and unsafe and concrete inside pool is cracking. Property needs alot of maintenance done. Wood on dock is rotted and unsafe and concrete inside of the pool is cracking. Building is very outdated inside and out.

Excellent. Small scale but lots of amenities swimming pool kayaks paddle boards comfortable waterfront chairs and private room balconies. Facility has only been open for a few months and was incredibly clean. Stayed two nights did not receive any housekeeping service after the first night. Checked with front desk at 3 pm and was told it would be addressed but service was never received. At checkout the following day explained to front desk clerk and received a 20 resort fee credit. Not a major problem for a short stay more of a disappointment that with a small number of rooms about 20 that service could n’t be provided. Not a problem if you ’re prepared just a reminder that there is no elevator at the facility and rooms are on the 2nd and 3rd floors.

Nice very clean property minimalist decor is a nice touch. Small pool nice beach. Light breakfast offered nothing special but appreciated for quick but in the AM. You can walk to Hog Heaven for dinner.

Great first night in the Keys. We stayed here on a Friday night on our first ever visit to the Keys. The property is under new ownership and newly renovated after the recent destruction from a hurricane. The staff owners were friendly and welcoming and the property is fresh looking and feeling. The little pool area is nice and there are paddle boards kayaks hammocks cornhole ping pong and chess on property. The check in area has a small supply of drinks etc. available for sale. It is on the water but not the beach although they do have a beach like area with lounge chairs. Nice location on Islamorada that is either a walk or quick ride to restaurants and bars. This is not some big resort but a nice newly freshened up cool little spot that we enjoyed and would stay again.

There was nothing we did not like. We were very pleased with the greeting and help from the staff. The Manager our hats off to her as she was very pleasant and helpful with info to surrounding areas. Our room was clean and very comfortable. The grounds was kept up nicely and the pool was very enjoyable. We truly enjoyed our stay and will definitely go back.

We Loved This Place. We stayed for 4 nights and we were so impressed. The rooms were clean and very nice. The amenities were awesome at our disposal were kayaks stand up paddle boards ping pong table pool and corn hole. Continental breakfast was available as well. Right on the water and you can even bring your boat if you like. The most delicious breeze blew off of the water during our stay. We want to go back.

Great Location and Outdoor Amenities. We were not sure what to expect of this motel style lodging but we were so pleasantly surprised. Not only was it newly renovated and clean it had a number of fun outdoor amenities like paddle boards kayaks jenga ping pong pool cornhole etc. It is a no frills facility but for the person looking to enjoy island life over a spa type experience then this is the place. During our short stay we took the paddle board and kayak out a couple of times to a nearby sandbar. We saw a shark sea turtle several bright red starfish and tons of harmless jellyfish. My only complaint was that the fins on the boards were banged up bent because from all guests having to use the boat ramp entry and sitting on the board in water too shallow. It did give a little extra core work to keep the board on course. Everything was true to the photos on the website.

Fisher Inn Fun. Super nice simple and clean rooms friendly and helpful staff immunities great including pool games paddle boarding and kaiaking right on site. Loved the area. While there wound recommend Robies for feeding the Tarpons Lorelei for sunsets and cracked conk and Lazy Days for Hogfish.

Short visit to the Keys. I loved the location and amenities of this hotel. It offers clean basic rooms with a small outdoor pool and lovely oceanfront lounge area. You can use kayaks and bicycles at no cost. The staff are very helpful and friendly. Close to a great variety of restaurants and the Islamorada brewing company. Great stay.
very clean spacious rooms nice pool area.

Great hotel and wonderful staff. Jen was amazing. This hotel is a remodel from the hurricane and is on the ocean side. It is centrally located in Islamorada across from a state park and near the city park. The rooms are clean and easy to spend a week in. We loved the pool and the dock fishing. We also loved the free use of kayaks and paddle boards. Jen was wonderful. She gave us good references on places to eat and was so helpful with any help we needed. We have been to Islamorada many times but have always found our accommodations either way expensive or just plan dumps.
